hevs.gdx2d.lib.interfaces

Interface GameInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Benchmarker, GdxGraphicsTest, PortableApplication

    public interface GameInterface
    Contains the methods to handle the application lifecycle. This lifecycle is independent from the hardware it runs on.

    Methods onPause() and onResume() are only invoked when the application runs on Android.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pierre-Andr√© Mudry (mui)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDispose()
      Called when the application stops.
      void onGameLogicUpdate()
      Called when the logic has to be updated.
      void onGraphicRender(GdxGraphics g)
      Called when the screen is refreshed, in sync with VSync.
      void onInit()
      Called when the application starts.
      Initializations and creation of new new objects must be done here.
      void onPause()
      Invoked when the application is paused.
      void onResume()
      Called when the application is restarted.

    • Method Detail

      • onInit

        void onInit()
        Called when the application starts.
        Initializations and creation of new new objects must be done here.

      • onDispose

        void onDispose()
        Called when the application stops. Tidying up must be done here.

      • onGraphicRender

        void onGraphicRender(GdxGraphics g)
        Called when the screen is refreshed, in sync with VSync.

      • onGameLogicUpdate

        void onGameLogicUpdate()
        Called when the logic has to be updated. Might not be called.

      • onPause

        void onPause()
        Invoked when the application is paused. Called only when running on Android.

      • onResume

        void onResume()
        Called when the application is restarted. Called only when running on Android.
        Initializations and creation of new new objects must be done here.
